name: Space Pool Alpha
description:
An intergalactic arcade pool simulation.  Featuring time attack, tournament and two-player modes.

Originally created in May 2010 using Adventure Game Studio.  Ported to XAGE in April 2020.

Controls:  WASD, Arrow keys.

Credits:

  • Programming and Game Design - Steve McCrea
  • Portraits and victory screen - AngelicCharon
  • Music - m0ds
  • Additional game design and testing - bicilotti
  • Port to XAGE - Dan Alexander
